      • TCPClient

        public TCPClient(java.lang.Integer port,
                 java.net.InetAddress address)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of tcp client. It creates socket, input and output to communicate with server.
        Parameters:
        port - number of server's port.
        address - IP address of server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is a problem with creating input, output or socket object.
